title: Negizhiyinil Lyrics Nimirndhu Nil Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Negizhiyinil
Singer(s): Haricharan, Saindhavi
Lyrics : Madhan Karky
MOvie: Nimirndhu Nil
Music: GV Prakash

Negizhiyinil nenjam kondae
unnai vilagi ponaval.
Nerungi vara aasai kondu,
uyir ilagi nirkiren.

Anayum thiri thoondida, oli meendida
ennai theendidu uyire.
ivalin thuyar theerthida, vali theerthida
viral korthidu uyire.

Naalaa puramum naalaayiram nee.
aanaalum unnai en thaedinen.

Negizhiyinil nenjam kondae
unnai vilagi ponaval.
Nerungi vara aasai kondu,
uyir ilagi nirkiren.

Hey pavalap paarai padalam pole
manadhil niraindhaai.
Immaigal moodi thirakkum munne
edhanaal maraindhaai.

Unmaiyil un unmaiyil
en kadhalai therindhaen.
Inmayil un inmayil,
un thanmayai arindhaen.
Kadandhodidum kanam yaavilum
enadhu yekkamey ganakkum.

Negizhiyinil nenjam endra
neruppai yen ketkiraai.
Nerinji mullai pole nindre
nerungi vara paarkiraai.

Uzhagam ariyaa kuzhandhai enavae
unnai naan ninaithaen.
Uzhagam unnai vanangum pozhudhu
un kadamai unardhaen.

Maatrida ennai maatrida
indha boomiye ninaikka.
Kadhale nee maarinaai
indhai engu naan uraikka.

Ennai yetridu unnai ootridu
uyir yetridu uyire.

Negizhiyinil nenjam kondae
neruppai yen ketkiraai.
Nerungi vara aasai kondu,
uyir ilagi nirkiraai.

Anayum thiri thoondida, oli meendida
unnai theenduven azhagae.
unadhu vizhi paarthida, viral korthida,
thuyar theendidum uyire.

Naalaa puramum naalaayiram nee.
aanaalum unnai en thaedinen.
